name: Don't Die (itch) (ThomasFauvel)
description:
Incomplete

Sadly I was unable to finish the game in time. There are many bugs and no real gameplay. But I am still entering the jam, because I had lots of fun making it! And I will release a finished version soon!

Controls

Arrow keys to move jump and crouch.

Ctrl and R to reset.

Rules

Try and survive as long as possible. Getting hit will make you take damage. Your health is shown by the number on your dice. Try not to die!

Credits

Game code and art by me (Thomas Fauvel)

Big muwah to Gruber for the Music

Sound effects from this Library
